data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will persistently bring mainly fine weather to Guangdong for the latter part of this week to early next week. It will be warm during the day with relatively large temperature difference between day and night over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to reach southern China midweek next week. Temperatures will fall appreciably over the region and it will be windy afterwards. The weather over the coast of Guangdong will be cold in the middle and latter parts of next week. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. Besides, the tropical cyclone over the seas east of the Philippines will intensify gradually and linger over the region in the next couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260115","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods at first. Mainly fine and dry during the day.
